<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Basic Wizard Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5109) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 223 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetypes** [Wizard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=218), [Spellshot](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=122) (Level 4)

**Prerequisites**
[Wizard Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=5106)

</column>

---

You gain the basic [spellcasting benefits](/Rules.aspx?ID=2132). Each time you gain a spell slot of a new rank from the wizard archetype, add two common spells of that rank to your spellbook.

<title level="2">Basic Wizard Spellcasting leads to...</title>
[Arcane Breadth](/Feats.aspx?ID=5111), [Expert Beast Gunner Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=3232), [Expert Wizard Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5112)
